quotes.message: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going too fast - you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.
quotes.name: Eddie Cantor

quotes.message: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Live every day as if it were going to be your last; for one day you're sure to be right.
quotes.name: Harry Morant

quotes.message: Simply enjoy life and the great pleasures that come with it.
quotes.name: Karolina Kurkova

quotes.message: I enjoy life when things are happening. I don't care if it's good things or bad things. That means you're alive.
quotes.name: Joan Rivers

quotes.message: Follow your hopes and not your fears.
quotes.name: Jody Bower

quotes.message: If you go around being afraid, you're never going to enjoy life. You have only one chance, so you've got to have fun.
quotes.name: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.message: Believe in 'live and let live'.
quotes.name: Satyendra Pandey

quotes.message: The safest course is to do nothing against one's conscience. With this secret, we can enjoy life and have no fear from death.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Do anything, but let it produce joy.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: Do what makes you happy, be with who makes you smile, laugh as much as you breathe, and love as long as you live.
quotes.name: Rachel Ann Nunes

quotes.message: Stop seeking out the storms and enjoy more fully the sunlight.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Don't ask yourself what the world needs; ask yourself what makes you come alive. And then go and do that. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
quotes.name: Harold Whitman

quotes.message: Slow down and remember this: Most things make no difference.
quotes.name: Tim Ferriss

quotes.message: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: We must be willing to get rid of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: You will never find time for anything. If you want time you must make it.
quotes.name: Charles Buxton

quotes.message: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
quotes.name: James Dean

quotes.message: I don't want to get to the end of my life and find that I lived just the length of it. I want to have lived the width of it as well.
quotes.name: Diane Ackerman

quotes.message: And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Its important to have specific dreams. Dream Big. Dream without fear.
quotes.name: Randy Pausch

quotes.message: Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.
quotes.name: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.message: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Live in the moment. Forget the past and don't concern yourself with the future.
quotes.name: Tanner Christensen

quotes.message: Fully embrace the now, no matter what the situation.
quotes.name: Patrick Flynn

quotes.message: Participate in life instead of just watching it pass you by.
quotes.name: Lindsey Wonderson

quotes.message: Keep your spirit free, be flexible, let go.
quotes.name: Leslie Brown

quotes.message: One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it's worth watching.
quotes.name: Gerard Way

quotes.message: Never save the best for later. You don't know what tomorrow holds.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: The most important thing is to enjoy your life, to be happy, it's all that matters.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: No man is a failure who is enjoying life.
quotes.name: William Feather

quotes.message: Find ecstasy in life. The mere sense of living is joy enough.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Dream big, stay positive, work hard, and enjoy the journey.
quotes.name: Urijah Faber

quotes.message: Enjoy the journey, enjoy every moment, and quit worrying about Winning and losing.
quotes.name: Matt Biondi

quotes.message: Take a step back, evaluate what is important, and enjoy life.
quotes.name: Teri Garr

quotes.message: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Life is a challenge, meet it! Life is a dream, realize it! Life is a game, play it! Life is love, enjoy it!
quotes.name: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.message: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: Live and work but do not forget to play, to have fun in life and really enjoy it.
quotes.name: Eileen Caddy

quotes.message: Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
quotes.name: Eric Davis

quotes.message: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: We will never enjoy life unless we make a quality decision to do so.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: You have to enjoy life. Always be surrounded by people that you like, people who have a nice conversation. There are so many positive things to think about.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: Negative thinking keeps us from enjoying life.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
quotes.name: Aaron Lauritsen

quotes.message: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.
quotes.name: Avril Lavigne

quotes.message: As you walk down the fairway of life you must smell the roses, for you only get to play one round.
quotes.name: Ben Hogan
